snippet.title: [UE4] Project Genom trailer
snippet.description:
Steam page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/389040
Official website: https://pgenom.com/

Actress : Olesya Astapova
Director/DoP : Victor Manin

First AD : Roman Lifancev
Production Designers : Vadim Inochkin, Vladimir Fedulov, Anna Moscaleva
Special Effects & Make up : Anna Moscaleva
Gaffer/Grip: Vladimir Fedulov
Production art: Gribov Alexey
CG supervising: Regina Mingazetdinova
Matte-paint/Visualisation: Victor Manin
Compositing: Regina Mingazetdinova 
Animations: Andrew Gertanov (ZzGERTzZ)

Backstage: Darya Alehina

SPECIAL THANKS TO:
Dmitry Shebunin 
Evgeniy Davidov
FTKU.RU

Directed by Victor Manin / Anvil Frame Studio
http://anvilframe.com/
